EmailTemplate.name: D&S Comms.Boxgrove NavData and SW Updates
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Navdata and SW Transfer to Muirhead Avionics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Honeywell UK Limited (Boxgrove, UK site) has completed the transition of its NavData Services for all products to Muirhead Avionics. The products affected include: Skymap II, Skymap IIIC, KMD150, Observer Versions 3 and 4, Sentinel and Pathfinder. This service will be provided by Muirhead Avionics starting in the AIRAC cycle 12/15.
The new contact and shipping information is: Muirhead Avionics 3 The Square Heathrow Southall Lane Southall, Middlesex UB2 5NH United Kingdom Tel: +44 (0)20 8571 3422 Email: gino.masoero@ametek.co.uk
Here are other details on how this could affect you:
- All subscription contracts will continue through the end of the subscription service.
- Service subscribers will ship cards directly to Muirhead Avionics, Attention: Subscriptions.
- Customer data cards at the Boxgrove site will automatically be transferred to Muirhead Avionics.
- If you request a one-time update, please contact Honeywell Wingman Service <https://wingmanservices.bendixking.com/wingman/pages/wingmanLoginPage.jsp> or request a quote from Muirhead Avionics.
- If you have any questions on your subscription, please contact Marilyn.hemmings@honeywell.com. <mailto:Marilyn.hemmings@honeywell.com>
Yours sincerely, M S White IEng FRAeS Director
